description:
BU \ BC\NORTHEASTERN UNIVERSITY \ HARVARD \ MIT. This is a beautiful, newly renovated house in the middle of Boston. It is 5 min walk distance to the MBTA public transportation, the GREEN LINE which takes you to everywhere from MIT to Harvard! There is a full option kitchen with washer/dryer inside the house! The neighborhood is very safe and surrounded by the best restaurants and venues,taverns. House is very close to TJMAX l, Marshals, Target, Star market, B fresh, and ex.s

Guest access
kitchen, living room , dining room , bathrooms

Other things to note
This place is not for everyone. This is not a hotel. There is no breakfast. This is a modest & cozy place in a prime location in the heart of Boston. You cannot beat this location. We worked extremely hard to secure this location. It is not fancy. it's an old brownstone building but it has its charm. It only has the bare necessities. People love it because it is practical and functional. U
